original_text: And when the officers have finished speaking to the people, then commanders shall be appointed at the head of the people.
korean_text: 백성에게 이르기를 마친 후에 군대의 지휘관들을 세워 무리를 거느리게 할지니라

sentences.original_text: And when the officers have finished speaking to the people,
at the head of the people.
